content.rendered:
Meet Brett Kotch, Head of Equities Trading Technology at Millennium. Brett embraces stretch targets as the way to drive change.

Learn more

excerpt.rendered: Meet Brett Kotch, Head of Equities Trading Technology at Millennium. Brett embraces stretch targets as the way to drive change.
